SELECT * FROM (SELECT inner_table.* , ROWNUM AS row_seq
FROM ( SELECT f.festival_no, f.festival_name, f.start_date, f.end_date, f.delete_flag, f.addr,f.area_code,f.read_count, f.reg_date, f.festival_image, z.user_id
FROM festival f, zzim z
WHERE f.festival_no = z.festival_no
AND z.user_id = #{userId}
AND f.end_date >= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'yyyymmdd')
AND delete_flag IS NULL
AND f.area_code = '${search.searchCondition}'
AND f.festival_name like '%${search.searchKeyword}%'
and f.area_code = '${search.searchCondition}' and f.festival_name like '%${search.searchKeyword}%'
order by f.reg_date desc
order by f.reg_date desc
order by f.festival_name
order by f.read_count desc
order by f.start_date desc
order by f.end_date
) inner_table
WHERE ROWNUM <= #{search.endRowNum} ) WHERE row_seq BETWEEN #{search.startRowNum} AND #{search.endRowNum}
